Name: Dog In A Box
About the game: Dog In A Box is a virtual reality dog building game, allowing the player to step into the shoes of a travelling toy dog maker. As you step into the shoes of the toy maker, you should expect to receive unexpected orders for toy dogs in often strange locations. Things you can expect as a Dog Toy Maker Fast paced dog making! Three fun environments! Weird and wonderful dog orders! A collection of all the dogs you have made in your career!
